Events.name: Striker's Edge
Events.content: Experience the thrill of solving logic puzzles, playing chess with a litttle twist and pitching ideas.
Events.round1: Nonogram is a picture logic puzzle. To disclose a concealed picture, cells in a grid must be coloured or left blank according to the alphabet on the side of the grid, just like mine sweeper. In this puzzle type, an alphabet is a form of discrete tomography that measures how many unbroken lines of filled-in squares are in any given row or column.
Events.round2: In this game, participants must take the horse piece from start to finish point given on the board.
Events.round3: The horse will cover 2.5 blocks in one step. While taking our horse from start to finish point, they must take the minimum number of steps in doing so. They must drop out the other colour board pieces in which the King piece is a must and collect the maximum number of points in doing so.
Events.round4: Players will be provided with a newsletter containing different articles. Each article will have problem statements hidden in them. Players will find hidden problem statements and pitch any sort of detailed solution. The best idea solution will be the winner.

Events.name: Ohm's Odyssey
Events.content: Experience the thrill of dart games, riddle solving and traditional snake & ladder games with a twist of electronics integrated into it.
Events.round1: Riddle Coding Teams of two participants will be assigned, and they will each receive four distinct puzzles to solve. Each team will receive a unique set of puzzles, with a colour as the solution. They'll get three more riddles to decode the sequence. The teams must figure out all four puzzles to receive a colour code. According to the resistor color coding they have to give the value of the resistor.
Events.round2: Teams of four participants will be divided, and each team will be given a circuit to figure out how much resistance to add so that the LED does not ignite. Then, each team will be given a total of 16 chances—4 for each player—to throw a dart onto a coloured dartboard and cross the resistance value's lower limit.

Events.name: Boolean Blitz
Events.content: Enjoy playing mind games with a blend of Electronics. Use basic knowledge of circuits to win against your opponents.
Events.round1: There is a given MIMO digital circuit with a blank space for a circuit component which will be a logic gate. The circuit will be of two phases first will convert character to ASCII code and second will consist of a logic gate with one blank gate. Player will feed in his alphabets in the ASCII converter. The objective of the game is to choose the right logic gate which leads to max output in the given digital circuit.
Events.round2: There will be a 4×4 Grid and every box will be named from 1 to 16. Every participant has to start from box 1. Each box will contain a digital circuit (consisting of logic gates) with 2 inputs and unique solution of output 1. Participants have to apply the input which gives 1 as output. After solving 16 boxes, according to the time taken and shortcut trick used, the result will be declared.

Workshops.name: Neural Networks
Workshops.content: Neural networks solve tasks like image recognition and language processing, emerging as powerful tools.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav invites you to an exciting workshop on the futuristic technology of Neuralink. Join us for an engaging session where we will explore the brain-computer interface technology. In this workshop, you will learn about the basics of Neuralink, including its potential applications and the science behind it. You will also witness practical demonstrations of the technology, discuss the ethical and social implications, and explore the future possibilities of Neuralink.
Workshops.round2: Whether you're an up to date person or just someone curious about the latest technology, this workshop is perfect for you. Don't miss this opportunity to learn about one of the most groundbreaking and revolutionary technologies of our time. Join us to enjoy the joy of learning.

Workshops.name: Simulink
Workshops.content: This workshop covers Simulink, a graphical tool for dynamic system modeling, including control and signal processing applications.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav is delighted to offer a workshop on Simulink, an essential tool for modeling, simulating, and analyzing dynamic systems. The workshop will cover a wide range of topics, including creating models, adding blocks, running simulations, and exploring Simulink's advanced features such as Model Explorer, Signal Editor, and Simulation Data Inspector.
Workshops.round2: Our experienced professionals will conduct the workshop and provide hands-on training, with real-world examples to enhance participants' learning. By the end of this workshop, participants will have a strong foundation in Simulink and be able to apply their knowledge to diverse engineering applications, making it a must-attend event for engineering enthusiasts.
Workshops.round3: Team Vibhav awaits for your participation. Follow us for more updates ….

Workshops.name: Verilog
Workshops.content: The session covers FPGA, ASIC, and embedded systems language principles, enabling Verilog design creation and testing.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav is thrilled to announce an upcoming workshop on Verilog, a hardware description language used to design digital circuits. This workshop is ideal for both beginners and experienced Verilog users who are interested in learning more about digital circuit design and improving their skills.
Workshops.round2: In this workshop, participants will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in writing and simulating Verilog code for various digital circuits. The workshop will cover the fundamentals of Verilog syntax, including data types, module instantiation, behavioral modeling, and testbench creation. Participants will also learn about timing and power analysis of digital circuits using Verilog simulation tools.
Workshops.round3: Join us at this exciting workshop to expand your knowledge of Verilog and become a more confident digital circuit designer. We look forward to seeing you there!

Events.name: Pahal
Events.content: This is a Event in ehich the locals are given information about meritious goverment schemes for their upliftment.
Events.round1: Team Vibhav successfully organized PAHAL, an impactful awareness campaign, on March 15 in Barot village. Our mission was not just to inform people about government schemes but to inspire and empower them by highlighting opportunities that could enhance their livelihoods. By reaching out directly to the community.
Events.round2: As part of this initiative, we focused on spreading awareness about the PM Vishwakarma Yojana, a scheme introduced to support artisans and traditional craftsmen. The scheme provides financial assistance, modern toolkits, and skill development training, ensuring that workers can enhance their craftsmanship and sustain their livelihoods.
Events.round3: Through PAHAL, Team Vibhav not only educated the local community about the PM Vishwakarma Yojana but also engaged with them to understand their challenges and aspirations. Many skilled workers, including carpenters, blacksmiths, and artisans, were unaware of the financial aid and training opportunities available to them.
Events.round4: The campaign also highlighted the role of technology and government policies in transforming rural livelihoods. We interacted with local workers and demonstrated how access to modern tools, financial support, and skill development programs could significantly improve their productivity and earning potential.
Events.round5: Apart from spreading awareness, PAHAL also fostered meaningful conversations and connections between the villagers and our team. The positive response from the community reinforced our belief that small initiatives can lead to significant changes.
Events.round6: Overall, PAHAL was a remarkable step towards community development, reinforcing the idea that awareness is the first step toward empowerment. The enthusiasm and participation of the villagers reflected their eagerness to embrace new opportunities. Team Vibhav remains committed to organizing such initiatives in the future.

Events.name: Prerak
Events.content: Reflecting on a day filled with inspiration and hope at Government Senior Secondary Girls School, Hamirpur,
Events.round1: Witnessing the spark of curiosity in young minds as we shared the wonders of engineering and technical fields was truly uplifting. The excitement in their eyes as they explored new concepts and possibilities reaffirmed our belief in the power of education and awareness.
Events.round2: The event, organized at a local girls' school in Hamirpur, was designed to introduce students to the fascinating world of engineering and its real-world applications. By simplifying complex technical concepts and making them engaging, we ensured that young learners could grasp the fundamentals and develop a keen interest in science and technology.
Events.round3: Interactive sessions played a crucial role in making the event engaging and informative. Our team conducted hands-on activities, live demonstrations, and discussions that helped students visualize scientific principles in action. From understanding basic electronics to exploring the applications of modern technology, every session was designed to enhance curiosity and inspire creative thinking.
Events.round4: The impact of PRERAK extended beyond just one day—it planted the seeds of curiosity and ambition that will continue to grow with time. The school faculty and students expressed their appreciation for the event, emphasizing how such initiatives play a crucial role in shaping career perspectives.

Workshops.name: Aavardhan
Workshops.content: Anytime is a Good time to start a Company. Driven by passion and perseverance, startups have the power to disrupt industries and shape the future.
Workshops.round1: Team Vibhav, in collaboration with the Incubation Centre, NIT Hamirpur, under the CM Startup Project of Himachal Pradesh, proudly presents आवर्धनः – From Spark to Unicorn Brilliance. This dynamic guest lecture is designed to inspire and educate aspiring entrepreneurs and innovators, providing them with valuable insights into the world of startups, business growth, and technological advancements.
Workshops.round2: We are honored to welcome Dr. Puran Singh, Associate Professor at IIT Mandi and Director of the Incubation Centre, IIT Mandi, as our esteemed guest lecturer. With extensive experience and expertise in entrepreneurship, innovation, and startup ecosystems, he has guided countless individuals in transforming their business ideas into thriving enterprises.
Workshops.round3: This interactive session will offer a unique opportunity for students, budding entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts to engage in meaningful discussions, ask questions, and gain first-hand insights into the challenges and opportunities in the startup ecosystem.
Workshops.round4: Beyond theoretical knowledge, Dr. Puran Singh will share real-life experiences and success stories, highlighting the essential skills, mindset, and resources required to navigate the competitive landscape of entrepreneurship.

Workshops.name: Cloud Computing
Workshops.content: This workshop offers practical training and insights into utilizing remote servers to store, manage, and process data and applications over the internet.
Workshops.round1: Embark on a transformative journey into the world of cloud computing with our upcoming workshop. Whether you're a beginner eager to explore the fundamentals or a seasoned professional looking to enhance your expertise, this workshop is tailored to equip you with the essential knowledge and hands-on experience needed to navigate the ever-evolving cloud landscape.
Workshops.round2: Dive into hands-on exercises that demystify the workings of leading cloud providers such as Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
Workshops.round3: Beyond technical skills, the workshop will delve into cloud security, cost optimization, and best practices for effectively managing cloud resources. Whether you're interested in building cloud-native applications, understanding DevOps in the cloud, or exploring AI and machine learning integrations, this session will provide you with a strong foundation and hands-on exposure to cutting-edge cloud technologies.
Workshops.round4: This workshop is not just about learning—it’s about collaboration and networking.  With cloud adoption accelerating across industries, acquiring cloud skills will open new doors in fields such as software development, cybersecurity, and IT infrastructure management.

Workshops.name: System on Chip
Workshops.content: This workshop provides hands-on learning and expertise in developing integrated circuits that incorporate all necessary components of electronic system onto a single chip.
Workshops.round1: Ready to dive deep into the revolutionary world of System on Chip (SoC) technology? Join us for an electrifying workshop where we explore the architecture, functionality, and real-world applications of SoC. This cutting-edge technology integrates multiple components, such as processors, memory, input/output interfaces, and more, onto a single chip, making it a game-changer in modern electronics.
Workshops.round2: Whether you're an aspiring engineer, a seasoned developer, or a tech enthusiast hungry for knowledge, this workshop promises to fuel your curiosity and enhance your expertise. We will break down the fundamentals of SoC architecture, including processor cores, communication buses, power management, and hardware-software co-design.
Workshops.round3: Beyond theory, the workshop will feature interactive hands-on sessions, allowing participants to work with SoC development boards and simulation tools.
Workshops.round4: Don’t miss out on this chance to unlock the potential of System on Chip and explore its transformative impact on modern technology. Whether you aspire to design the next-gen processors, optimize embedded systems, or innovate in IoT and AI-driven applications, this workshop is the perfect stepping stone toward mastering SoC technology. Join us and be a part of the future of chip innovation!
